Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total project budget must not be exceeded

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration is fixed and cannot be changed

Name: team_size_minimum
Description: The team must have a minimum size

Name: worker_availability_threshold
Description: Each worker's availability must be above a threshold

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Only high-priority features can be selected

Name: story_points_capacity
Description: Total story points in a sprint cannot exceed team velocity

Name: task_effort_capacity
Description: Total effort of tasks cannot exceed team capacity

Name: blocker_must_be_resolved
Description: Critical blockers must be resolved before deployment

Name: snapshot_test_status
Description: Development snapshot must pass tests before release

Name: skill_required_for_task
Description: Task assignment requires worker to have necessary skill
